root.message: The SOURCE_TYPE field for indicator 3-1-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: Please see page 14 of the report WHO, UNICEF, UNFPA, World Bank Group and the United Nations Population Division “Maternal mortality: Levels and trends 2000 to 2017” for full details. (https://www.who.int/reproductivehealth/publications/maternal-mortality-2000-2017/en/).

Fuentes de datos

Descripción:

Véase la página 14 del informe (https://www.who.int/reproductivehealth/publications/maternal-mortality-2000-2017/en/).

Sources de données

Description :

Veuillez consulter la page 14 du rapport (https://www.who.int/reproductivehealth/publications/maternal-mortality-2000-2017/en/ (en anglais)).

Источники данных

Описание:

См. страницу 14 отчета (https://www.who.int/reproductivehealth/publications/maternal-mortality-2000-2017/en/).
